name: Howler
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Pack Tactics: A howler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the howler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.Multiattack: The howler makes two bite attacks.
actions.Rending Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is frightened it takes an additional 22 (4d10) psychic damage. This attack ignores damage resistance.
actions.Mind-Breaking Howl (Recharge 6): The howler emits a keening howl in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area that isn't deafened must succeed on a DC 16+1d6 + 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the howler's next turn. While a creature is frightened in this way, its speed is halved, and it is incapacitated. A target that successfully saves is immune to the Mind-Breaking Howl of all howlers for the next 24 hours.
